meta.description: Corentin Boucard is a backend developer with a DevOps mindset. Passionate about automation and application development, he loves tackling technical challenges and optimizing workflows.

blogPage.title: Corentin's <1>Blog</1>
blogPage.intro1: Hi everyone! Welcome to my personal blog.
blogPage.intro2: In this blog, I'll write about my projects (what I'm doing/how I did it), personal experiences, and some more random stuff.
blogPage.intro3: You can follow me on social media and my <1>Github account.</1>
